name: BBQ Thai Garlic Beef Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for BBQ Thai Garlic Beef Recipe: Beef Slices ½ kg Garlic Paste 2 tbsp Green Chili Paste 2 tbsp Papaya Paste 2 tbsp Brown Sugar 1 tbsp Crushed Black Pepper 1 tsp Thai Red Curry Paste 1 tbsp Basil 1/3 tsp Oyster Sauce 1 tbsp Oil 1-2 tbsp Salt to taste
instructions: Take a mixing bowl add ½ kg of beef slices add 2 tbsp of garlic paste, 2 tbsp of green chili paste Add 2 tbsp of papaya paste, 1 tbsp of brown sugar, 1 tsp of crushed black pepper, 1 tbsp of red Add Thai curry paste, 1/3 tsp of basil, 1 tbsp of oyster sauce, 1-2 tbsp of oil Add to taste salt mix it well and marinade the beef slices in it and leave it for 2-3 hours Then skewer the beef slices in a barbeque sticks then steam it and fry then smoke with the piece of coal. At last grilled it on a grill pan take it out in serving platter and serve it.
